price: Si obedecen a un ser humano como ustedes, serán unos perdedores.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in aṭaʿtum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
